figure_1: FTIR spectra of lignin samples with and without copper catalyst, treated at (a) 600 째C; (b) 800 째C; and (c) 1000 째C, respectively.
figure_2: XRD spectra of Cu-lignin mixtures with their weight ratios of 1:4 and 1:1, respectively.
figure_3: TEM images of Cu-lignin mixtures with weight ratios of 1:4 (a); 1:2 (b); and 1:1 (c), treated at 1000 째C.
